metadata.description: Internal Treasure Data skills for Claude Code to enhance productivity with TD-specific tools and workflows

plugins.name: sql-skills
plugins.description: SQL query skills for Treasure Data including Trino and Hive query optimization, Trino CLI for interactive queries, and TD MCP server for Claude Code integration with natural language data exploration

plugins.name: field-agent-skills
plugins.description: Field Agent development and production best practices including deployment workflows, documentation standards, and professional Plotly visualization guidelines for creating executive-ready agents

plugins.name: workflow-skills
plugins.description: Treasure Workflow orchestration and data transformation skills including workflow creation, management, debugging, optimization, and dbt (data build tool) for Treasure Data Trino

plugins.name: sdk-skills
plugins.description: Skills for using Treasure Data SDKs including JavaScript SDK for browser-based event tracking and pytd (Python SDK) for querying data, importing pandas DataFrames, and building analytical pipelines

plugins.name: template-skill
plugins.description: Template for creating new TD-specific Claude Code skills with best practices and standard structure
